Scattershot/Dark One/Breakdown:



"Breakdown, stop him before he breaks open that door!" Dark One ordered, 
firing off 20 explosive shells at the behind of Stalker's tank mode.

Scattershot reached into subspace, taking out a charge, smiling evilly.

Breakdown transformed to his artillery mode, firing off an explosive shell at 
the back left tread of Stalker's tank mode.
